content:
I'm looking for a tool to list all the instantiation of every generic function.
This's useful to debug code bloat and , interesting.

foo<T>(){}
foo(&str){}
foo(&String){}  // duplicated

This is something similar to cargo-bloat, but not the same.
If there is such tools?
Does this idea make sense?

lqd
-Z print-mono-items should be useful here

This is what I'm looking for!
But the output is a bit lengthy.
A similar too is cargo-llvm-lines which will show the number of copies of a function.
